response.original_title: 放送禁止VTR！ 実録心霊スポット 真夜中の廃墟 単独潜入レポート
response.overview: This is a compilation of a horror series in which the crew visits a scary spot where there are urban legends and bad rumors, and investigates the truth behind the rumors. What was photographed in a tunnel with a reputation that has been erased? A female reporter tries to sneak into the bathroom of an abandoned house at the end of a mountain trail...
response.title: Broadcast Prohibited VTR! Real Ghost Spots: Midnight Ruins Solo Infiltration Report
